alert.note: Alert for Greene; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 4:15PM EST until February 23 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Little Miami River at Spring Valley. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Miami River at Spring Valley. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flooding impacts short areas of Middletown and Waynesville Roads, in addition to Corwin Road and Corwin Park. Backwater flooding may impact Route 725 in Sugarcreek township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...No graphical forecast is available for this location, however the river will have a long and slow crest before falling below flood stage late Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
